document_data.mainbody:
Lunapine was a languid-seeming moon dog of the late 14 century DR.
Lunapine was the closest companion of Naneatha Suaril, the high priestess of Sel√ªne at the House of the Moon temple in Waterdeep around 1370 DR. A regular guest of hers, Lunapine stayed in the antechamber outside her quarters.
